mapper.sql: schoolID, schoolName, schoolNum, schoolAdmin, schoolPassword, cityID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bk_school (schoolName, schoolNum, schoolAdmin, schoolPassword, cityID) VALUES (#{schoolName},#{schoolNum},#{schoolAdmin}, #{schoolPassword},#{cityID})
mapper.update: UPDATE bk_school SET schoolName=#{schoolName}, schoolNum=#{schoolNum}, schoolAdmin=#{schoolAdmin}, schoolPassword=#{schoolPassword}, cityID=#{cityID} WHERE schoolID=#{schoolID}
